product_name: Sierra Designs Enterprise Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Soon to be your best friend on rainy days, the waterproof Sierra Designs Enterprise Jacket will keep you dry and looking great in any urban environment. Waterproof, breathable fabric and fully taped, PVC-free seams keep moisture out. Zippered hand pockets and a single chest pocket stash your cell phone and other small items. Attached, fully adjustable hood is ready to protect you from sudden downpours. Adjustable hem and cuffs. Closeout.
short_description: Soon to be your best friend on rainy days, the waterproof Sierra Designs Enterprise Jacket will keep you dry and looking great in any urban environment.
